Hotel

ID
{{ hotel.id }}
Menu
{{ hotel.menu }}
Places To Sleep
{{ hotel.placesToSleep }}
Organization
{{ hotel.organization?.id }}
User
{{ hotel.user?.id }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { IHotel } from '../hotel.model'; import { DataUtils } from 'app/core/util/data-util.service'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-hotel-detail', templateUrl: './hotel-detail.component.html', }) export class HotelDetailComponent implements OnInit { hotel: IHotel | null = null; constructor(protected dataUtils: DataUtils, protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ hotel }) => { this.hotel = hotel; }); } byteSize(base64String: string): string { return this.dataUtils.byteSize(base64String); } openFile(base64String: string, contentType: string | null | undefined): void { this.dataUtils.openFile(base64String, contentType); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
